x_snc_team_action_items.description:
Hareesh is the star performer and shows strong leadership skills in the partner portal team. He led multiple initiatives to success and to name a few, Partner Portal Onboarding UI, PartnerPortal Jakarta Upgrade, Onboarding workflow. He is commendable at internalising the asks from stakeholders and driving towards achieving the goals with the never give-up attitude. He is pretty good at understanding the needs of the team and doesn't hesitate to lend a helping hand. Hareesh is a cool headed individual who keeps a balance and sticks to rationale when comes to business conversations, takes a matured call in setting the right expectations and ensures that he never misses the boat to what is committed. He has the itch towards raising the bar high and promotes innovation culture within the team. Hareesh is a key resource who is almost ready for the next level of responsibilities and is the right fit to the organisation to align with the goals and aspirations.
Key Projects 1. Initial design of CLM project 2. Patent and Click Thru application 3. Partner Portal Phase IV 4. Design & implementation on Onboarding workflow 5. Partner Portal onboarding UI 6. Jakarta upgrade
Innovation/Others 1. Rapid Code Review Tool
